SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT C.SS_NAME, C.SS_IMAGE, (SELECT F.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE F WHERE F.CODE=A.FM_GRADE) FM_GRADE, A.FM_CLASS, A.FM_NUM FM_NUM, A.SS_NO, NVL(D.BI_WF,'데이터없음') as BI_WF, NVL(D.BI_WI,'데이터없음') as BI_WI, NVL(E.VS_FIRST,'데이터없음') as VS_FIRST FROM FM_MEMBER A, T_MEMBER B, S_MEMBER C, BASIC_INFORMATION D, VALUE_SETTING E
WHERE A.TT_NO = #{ttNo} AND A.SS_NO = C.SS_NO AND A.SS_NO = D.SS_NO(+) AND A.SS_NO = E.SS_NO(+) AND A.DELETEYN ='Y'
UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT C.SS_NAME, C.SS_IMAGE, (SELECT F.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE F WHERE F.CODE=A.JR_GRADE) JR_GRADE, A.JR_CLASS, A.JR_NUM FM_NUM, A.SS_NO, NVL(D.BI_WF,'데이터없음') as BI_WF, NVL(D.BI_WI,'데이터없음') as BI_WI, NVL(E.VS_FIRST,'데이터없음') as VS_FIRST FROM JR_MEMBER A, T_MEMBER B, S_MEMBER C, BASIC_INFORMATION D, VALUE_SETTING E
WHERE A.TT_NO = #{ttNo} AND A.SS_NO = C.SS_NO AND A.SS_NO = D.SS_NO(+) AND A.SS_NO = E.SS_NO(+) AND A.DELETEYN ='Y'
UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT C.SS_NAME, C.SS_IMAGE, (SELECT F.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE F WHERE F.CODE=A.SR_GRADE) SR_GRADE, A.SR_CLASS, A.SR_NUM FM_NUM, A.SS_NO, NVL(D.BI_WF,'데이터없음') as BI_WF, NVL(D.BI_WI,'데이터없음') as BI_WI, NVL(E.VS_FIRST,'데이터없음') as VS_FIRST FROM SR_MEMBER A, T_MEMBER B, S_MEMBER C, BASIC_INFORMATION D, VALUE_SETTING E
WHERE A.TT_NO = #{ttNo} AND A.SS_NO = C.SS_NO AND A.SS_NO = D.SS_NO(+) AND A.SS_NO = E.SS_NO(+) AND A.DELETEYN = 'Y' ) ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(FM_NUM )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT distinct
A.NP_NO, A.NP_TITLE, A.NP_PSDATE, A.NP_PEDATE, A.NP_CENTER, A.ACODE, CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.NP_PSDATE DESC)/ #{listSize}) PAGENO, COUNT(A.NP_NO) OVER() AS TOTALCOUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.NP_PSDATE DESC ) as ROWNO FROM
NONPROGRAM A, NON_APPLICATION B
WHERE A.NP_NO = B.NP_NO AND B.SS_NO = #{ssNo} AND SUBSTR(A.NP_PSDATE,0,2) =#{bryearNo})ABC WHERE ABC.PAGENO = #{brpageNo} ORDER BY NP_PSDATE DESC

SELECT *FROM(SELECT OA_NO, OA_INSERTDATE, TT_NAME, OA_FIELD, CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY OA_INSERTDATE DESC)/ #{listSize}) PAGENO, COUNT(OA_NO) OVER() AS TOTALCOUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY OA_INSERTDATE DESC ) as ROWNO
FROM (SELECT distinct A.OA_NO, A.OA_INSERTDATE, C.TT_NAME, (SELECT E.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE E WHERE A.OA_FIELD=E.CODE) OA_FIELD
FROM ONLINE_APPLICATION A, T_MEMBER C WHERE A.SS_NO = #{ssNo} AND A.TT_NO = C.TT_NO AND SUBSTR(A.OA_INSERTDATE,0,2) =#{cgyearNo}
UNION ALL
SELECT distinct A.VR_NO, A.VR_DATE, C.TT_NAME, (SELECT E.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE E WHERE A.VR_FIELD=E.CODE) OA_FIELD
FROM VISITCOUNSEL_RSV A, T_MEMBER C WHERE A.SS_NO = #{ssNo} AND A.TT_NO = C.TT_NO AND SUBSTR(A.VR_INSERTDATE,0,2) =#{cgyearNo}))ABC WHERE ABC.PAGENO = #{cgpageNo} ORDER BY OA_INSERTDATE DESC

SELECT SS_NO, VS_FIRST, VS_SECOND, VS_THIRD, VS_INSERTDATE, VS_UPDATEDATE
FROM VALUE_SETTING WHERE SS_NO = #{ssNo}

SELECT SS_NO, SS_NAME, SS_GRADE
FROM S_MEMBER WHERE SS_NO = #{ssNo}
